rules_text:
Whenever one or more creature cards leave your graveyard, each opponent loses 2 life.
At the beginning of your end step, if a creature card left your graveyard this turn, transform UX03 Consul V.
rules_text2:
Whenever Moebius V attacks, surveil 2. [i](Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)[/i]
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you are stagnant, transform Moebius V. [i](You are stagnant if you didn't attack a player during your last turn.)[/i]
